output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CMF: 11240015" which indicates electoral propaganda material
2. Refers to candidate(s): Yes - Directly mentions Elena Lasconi (USR presidential candidate) - Mentions Ludovic Orban (another presidential candidate)
3. Addresses wide population: - Yes, this is a paid Facebook/Instagram advertisement - Uses inclusive language ("Hai sƒÉ facem istorie √ÆmpreunƒÉ!") - Calls for collective action - Large estimated audience (100,001-500,000)
4. Electoral objective: - Clear electoral intent with phrases like "üó≥Ô∏è Turul 1 = Turul decisiv!" - Explicitly promotes Elena Lasconi as "singurul candidat capabil" - Calls for votes: "Nu ne putem permite sƒÉ irosim niciun vot" - Uses electoral hashtags (#Alegeri2024 #VotulTauConteaza)
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content
6. Personal opinion: No, this is a structured campaign message with CMF number and clear call to action for voting

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Direct promotion of a presidential candidate - Clear call to action for voting - Paid advertisement reaching large audience - Uses campaign slogans and electoral messaging - Explicitly discusses presidential election strategy
conclusion.message-for-police: Lorand Toth, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul USR la prezidentiale Elena Lasconi, dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie. Postarea cu ID-ul 1575859769965869 constituie propaganda electorala conform Art. 36(7) prin: prezenta numarului CMF (11240015), promovarea directa a candidatului, obiectiv electoral explicit prin indemnul la vot ("Turul 1 este decisiv"), si adresarea catre publicul larg prin reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram. Mentionam ca aceasta postare sponsorizata continua sa fie activa dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, incalcand astfel prevederile legale privind perioada de campanie electorala.
